thread.section_title: KatchAKid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KatchAKid | katchakid.com
thread.title: Dee S

author: Dee S
title: Dee S
text: After debating for months on what product and who to use to help us keep our child safe; we woke up and our child could walk! We decided on the net because of the small yard and security of only a few being able to remove net with special tool. We received a call to confirm date of installation, which was about 2 weeks out. We also received a second confirmation the day before installation. Day of installation we get a call from installers and they give a 15 minute eta. Installation took a couple of hours and everything was clean and looked good. Mike did a good job of demonstrating removal and installation. Lavandis also did a good job answering my questions. I now feel safer with my one year old running around. 5 stars for customer service. Thanks guys!
